Function Documentation

int mxcam_register_vidpid ( int  vid,
int  pid,
char *  desc,
SOC_TYPE  soc,
DEVICE_TYPE  dev 
)

mxcam_register_vidpid: register a device with its vid/pid

Parameters:
vid :vendor id
pid :product id
*desc :device description
chip :camera soc type
Return values:
MXCAM_ERR_VID_PID_ALREADY_REGISTERED - vid and pid already registered
MXCAM_OK - upon success
Remarks:
This is needed for the scan, open and poll functions to work
int mxcam_scan ( struct mxcam_devlist **  devlist  ) 

mxcam_scan: Scan for plugged registered devices

Parameters:
**devlist :list of registered devices
Return values:
Negativevalue - upon libusb error
Positivevalue - number of device(s) found
MXCAM_OK - upon success
Remarks:
int mxcam_open_by_devnum ( int  dev_num  ) 

mxcam_open_by_devnum: open a device based on device number

Parameters:
dev_num :device number
Return values:
MXCAM_ERR_INVALID_DEVICE - Failed to open device
Negativevalue - upon libusb error
MXCAM_ERR_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND - Device not found
MXCAM_OK - upon success
Remarks:
use mxcam_scan to get valid device number
int mxcam_open_by_busaddr ( int  bus,
int  addr 
)

mxcam_open_by_busaddr: Open a device based on its bus number and device address

Parameters:
bus :device number
addr :device address
Return values:
MXCAM_ERR_INVALID_DEVICE - Failed to open device
Negativevalue - upon libusb error
MXCAM_ERR_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND - Device not found
MXCAM_OK on success
Remarks:
use mxcam_scan to get valid bus number and address
int mxcam_poll_one ( void   ) 

mxcam_poll_one: Check if a registered device is plugged and open it or open the first found if there are multiples registered devices connected.

If no registered device is plugged yet wait until one is plugged

Return values:
MXCAM_ERR_INVALID_DEVICE - Failed to open device
Negativevalue - upon libusb error
number of devices device found
int mxcam_poll_new ( void   ) 

mxcam_poll_new: Wait until a new registered device is plugged and open it

Return values:
MXCAM_ERR_INVALID_DEVICE - Failed to open device
Negativevalue - upon libusb error
